network_ssid.get: iw dev | grep ssid | head -1 | xargs | cut -b 6-

network_list.get: iwlist wlan0 scanning | grep ESSID | grep -v '""' | grep -v '\x' | sed 's/^[ \t]*ESSID:"//' | sed 's/"$//' | sort | uniq

device_list.get: nmap -sn "$(ip route | awk '/default/ {print $3}' | head -1)"/24 -oG - | grep 'Status: Up'

network_device.get: iw dev | grep Interface | head -1 | xargs | cut -b 11-

network_pass.set: ifconfig '{network_device}' down; sed 's/ssid="[^"]*"/ssid="{line}"/' /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf | sed 's/psk="[^"]*"/psk="{network_pass}"/' >tmp; mv tmp /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf; wpa_cli -i '{network_device}' reconfigure; ifconfig '{network_device}' up
